report.title: POMS My Walks: Walks relevant for an Indicia user
report.description: A list of top level samples for use in the POMS My Walks report calendar grid. At the time of writing, this is the same as the EBMS report but with the addition of Butterfly/Bee Hoverfly mode label.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON l.id=lav.location_id AND lav.deleted=false AND lav.location_attribute_id=#alloc_id# AND lav.int_value=#cms_user_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id=#mode_smp_attr_id# AND sav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=sav.int_value AND ctt.termlist_id=#mode_termlist_id# #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND (s.created_by_id=#user_id# OR lav.id IS NOT NULL) #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: alloc_id
param.description: Select the attribute used to allocation locations to the user

param.name: mode_smp_attr_id
param.display: Butterfly/Bee Hoverfly mode smp attr ID
param.description: The sample attribute that hold the Butterfly/Bee Hoverfly mode

param.name: mode_termlist_id
param.description: The termlist ID that holds the mode options

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: cms_user_id
param.description: Enter the CMS ID of the user
